name: CPS_2_Support_externally_sourced_Information
title: CPS.2 Support externally-sourced Information (Function)
description: Capture and maintain a variety of information from multiple external sources.
purpose: External sources are those outside the EHR system, including clinical, administrative, and financial information systems, other EHR systems, Personal Health Record (PHR) systems, and data received through health information exchange networks.

statement.label: CPS.2#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture and store a reference to externally-sourced information.

statement.label: CPS.2#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture and store a reference to externally-sourced Emergency Medical Services (EMS) information.

statement.label: CPS.2#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render tagged patient health information derived from administrative or financial data and the source of that data for use by authorized users.
